source_push_port - Source push port.

addDevice

public void addDevice(java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      int pin,
                      boolean is_digital)
Add device in the configuration file.

Parameters:
type - Class name.
name - Name of device, for convention write it in lower-case.
pin - Number of pin on Arduino board.
is_digital - True if the device is digital, False if not.
